Being inhumane to others is something that can obviously be done, is it possible to be inhumane to yourself?
 People can be restrained to prevent them from self harming but does that count as being inhumane?

I think you cannot be inhumane to yourself, because we are not creatures that relish in our own fearful pain. True, for some pain is pleasurable, but does that make it inhumane? Not so, because they do not view it as inhumane or "bad" because they view it as pleasure. Humans for the most part seek pleasure and not pain (that is something that would hurt us physically or mentally), but we can be inhumane to others because we are inflicting pain that they do not want upon them. I think, that being inhumane requires a sense of one doing it out of wanting to do it either to inflict pain or for pleasure. For someone who does it for neither pain or pleasure, it is not inhumane. I hope I am making myself clear.

Being inhumane to others is something that can obviously be done, is it possible to be inhumane to yourself?
 People can be restrained to prevent them from self harming but does that count as being inhumane?

 Geeze! Of course you can be inhumane to yourself!
 
 Haven't you ever heard of self-flagellation?
 
 Or the ridiculous flagellants of extreme Catholicsim?
 
 Certain members of Opus Dei who wear the horrific cilice? The use of Discipline in Opus Dei ritual?
 
 Discipline: a cord-like whip which resembles macrame, used on the buttocks or back once a week. Opus Dei members must ask permission to use it more often, which many do. The story is often told in Opus Dei that the Founder was so zealous in using the discipline, he splattered the bathroom walls with streaks of blood.
 ODAN - Corporal Mortification
 
 Unless, of course, you do not view "corporal mortification" as torture, which I think makes you really weird.
 
 Yeah, you, Zardoz!
 
 You are really weird!

Most Americans are smart enough not to mention in mixed company that they are republican except for republicans.

You might want to cruise on a cruiseline other than Celebrity.emoticon_xclown My weddingmoon was on such a cruise. Democrats were few and doggedly maligned.

Voting Republican is the bestest thing I've ever done.
 
 It's like giving me the ability to tell the WHOLE WORLD:
 "OH YEAH!?! WELL FLAG YOU!"
